reviewtext: I have owned three of these drives now, and all three have failed in a matter of months. Thankfully I've been using them as one disk in a RAID, so I haven't lost any data yet, but this failure rate is unacceptable. Meanwhile, the Western Digital drives in my RAID have been chugging along for over 3 years without issue. Do *not* buy these Seagate drives unless you want to lose data.
